channel.title: All clients help ?!?!?
channel.description:
i cant even connect to moparscape when i run the built in server every client i use i cant connect to the source this is doing my head in all i want to do is start working on a server but i cant do that if i cant even get onto the game
i run moparscape it starts i click start server it starts enter login test - test
gives me this
[05:24:15] Logging into (test, *****) [05:24:15] Your UID is: 81633729 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:50511 Registering user test with pass test Server: hybridscape Server (2): Exception! Server: ClientHandler: Client test disconnected. [05:24:17] Couldn't open output stream to log file test-20110429.log [05:24:17] [05:24:17] Logging into (test, *****) [05:24:17] Your UID is: 34685303 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:50512 Did not save for test Server: ClientHandler: Client test disconnected.
i cant connect any client to any source im running windows 7 whats going on ??

item.title: All clients help ?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

If you’re getting disconnected immediately it could be several things,

  1. You’re UID.
  2. The headicons, some servers use HeadIcon, others use headiconsprayer.
  3. You’re NPC’s bits, 317’s use 12, 474 use 14 bits, and i’m pretty sure 562+ use 16.

Those are the only reasons I know of.

Read full topic

item.title: All clients help ?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

You have a UID set. You need a client with the same UID number for you to be able to log in. This is to prevent cheat clients and other things.

Read full topic
